title: Coronavirus: US sees record 884 deaths in one day
description: The number of infections across the country has risen to more than 213,000 since the outbreak began.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 New York City is the worst hit place in the US
There were 884 deaths in the US linked to coronavirus in the past 24 hours - a new record, Johns Hopkins University said on Wednesday evening.
